description: Independent research is offered for students dedicated to an in-depth research experience. Emphasis is placed on the iterative process of experimentation and analysis. Students interested in independent research may enroll in CHEM 297 or CHEM 398. Each course requires a faculty supervisor, who will make the decision as to which course is appropriate. May be taken more than once. Pass or No Pass (P/N) only (may not be taken for a grade). Offered each term. Prerequisite: permission of the instructor.
name: Independent Research (.25, .5, 1.0)
title: Independent Research
